name: Sun Defenders
description:
Play as a flower defending their home from the sun, fight zombies, birds, and the dark. Regenerate during the day build a base, and hide in the dark. Protect your sun for the player in runners for the sun, and swing guy.

Instructions:

Click or E to shoot/build

Weapons, and tools are rotated to your mouse

Monsters, and difficulty will increase

Player will be given invincibility after hit

- By Nocrom Studios 

- Oreo Osborn you know who you are
